com.scriptedmc.script.client

Class SMCClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scriptedmc.script.client.SMCClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventEmitter

    @SideOnly(value=CLIENT)
public class SMCClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEventEmitter
    Main client class. You can get it with 
    Polyglot.import("client");
    on client side Also will emit client-side events
